sentence: The biggest problem with prostitution as a career path... all the jobs are entry level
explanation: The word level refers to a stage or rank in a hierarchy
first_new_sentence: The water in the pool is at a consistent level
second_new_sentence: After working hard all year, she finally reached a new level in her career.

sentence: How did the rooster get a lot of chicks? a lot of good yolks!
explanation: The word yolk refers to the yellow part of an egg
first_new_sentence: The yolk of a chicken egg is rich in nutrients
second_new_sentence: The artist used yellow dye to imitate the yolk color in his painting.

sentence: How does a reaver clean his spear? he puts it in the wash.
explanation: The word wash refers to the act of cleaning
first_new_sentence: I will wash the car before the trip
second_new_sentence: Its important to wash your hands regularly to prevent the spread of germs.

sentence: What do you call a deer with flashlights for eyes? a bright eye deer.
explanation: The word eye refers to the organ of sight
first_new_sentence: The doctor examined her eye for any signs of infection
second_new_sentence: She always had an eye for detail in her artwork.

sentence: What kind of shoes do frogs wear? open toad sandals... ill show myself out - thank you
explanation: The word toad refers to a type of amphibian
first_new_sentence: She came across a toad while walking by the pond
second_new_sentence: The experts studied the toads habitat to protect it from extinction.

sentence: I was struggling to figure out how lightning works then it struck me
explanation: The word strike can mean to hit or to occur suddenly
first_new_sentence: The workers decided to strike for better wages
second_new_sentence: The sudden strike of the clock signaled the hour.

sentence: What do you call your whore mother? nass
explanation: The word nass can refer to a slang use for a contemptible person
first_new_sentence: Despite the criticism, he held his head high in front of the nass of the party
second_new_sentence: The character showed a nass attitude during the argument.
